name: Ruiru Estate
description: A delicate light roast showcasing the unique terroir of Western Kenya's Ruiru estate.

name: Sacred Hills Lot #3
description: Our premium medium roast with complex flavor notes and exceptional balance.

name: Msitu Blend
description: A smooth and approachable blend supporting our Hands for Msitu reforestation project.

name: Western Reserve
description: A bold dark roast that maintains the origin character while delivering rich, deep flavors.

name: Farmers' Choice
description: A special lot selected by our farmer partners showcasing exceptional quality.

name: Heritage Blend
description: Celebrating traditional coffee varieties and processing methods of Western Kenya.
